As a Loan Officer at Nova Home Loans, I help educate individuals and their families by bringing awareness to the range of mortgage and reverse mortgage products that can help achieve their financial dreams and goalsThis is done by using my over 15 years of financial service experience to help guide individuals and families to find the mortgage that best fits their individual needs. Whether it is a person's first home or a person's dream home, I can guide them through the process. I feel each borrower deserves the time and attention it takes to learn about and then select the right mortgage product that will help their specific situation. I want the borrower to feel comfortable with the choice they make. I take pride in making a difference in people's lives by helping them realize the benefit of home ownership. I have learned that it takes a patient person with the utmost integrity, extensive product knowledge and experience to be able to navigate the complex maze of lending today.
15333 North Pima Road, Suite 130 Scottsdale, AZ 85260

Over the last 30+ years, Paradise Valley North Little League has provided boys and girls in Northeast Phoenix an opportunity to play baseball. Volunteers from allwalks of life have donated their time, energy, and, yes, their money, to ensure that Paradise Valley North Little League would be a positive experience for the youth of our community.To continue to be successful Paradise Valley North Little League needs your help and financial support.Your contribution will allow Paradise Valley North Little League to continue to provide a safe and clean environment for the families of Northeast Phoenix to enjoy participating in Little League baseball, as well as, helping the League revitalize its facilities. Through principals of team play, fair competition, and good sportsmanship, the Little League baseball experience canhelp broaden the foundation established by parents, guardians, and teachers. Today's Little Leaguers are tomorrow's leaders. Your sponsorship or in-kind donation to Paradise Valley North Little League will help play a part in developing our community leaders of tomorrow.For more information or questions on becoming a Paradise Valley North Little League sponsor, contact: John Adkins at 480-231-6189
